name: Checkers Time - Multiplayer
description:
Play Checkers against other people from all over the world. Checkers Time is a strategy game where the goal is to capture your opponents pieces. You capture by jumping over the opponent piece. Pieces only move forward in a diagonal one square at a time, or 2 squares if jumping an opponent piece. Move a piece to the other side and it becomes a King. Kings can move forwards or backwards. Capture all pieces to win the game.

Features:
Play online against other players
Chat in game
Leader boards with ratings.
Move review.
Friend list
Board size: 8x8
Rules: Forced jumps or optional jumps.
Multiple board colors
Multiple piece images

Play many games at the same time, play at your convenience. This is a notification based game, you will get notifications when its your turn, invited to a game, new messages and so on.
